languages.text: "Ну что, выясним, что там о вас наушничают, а?.." {n}Идира усмехается, потирает руки — и внезапно замирает с глупой улыбкой на губах и чуть склоненной набок головой. Вы ощущаете, как кожа покрывается мурашками, а воротник начинает едва заметно трепетать — словно на сквозняке, вылетевшем из приоткрытой двери.{/n}

"All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ну что, выясним, что там о вас наушничают, а?.." {n}Идира усмехается, потирает руки — и внезапно замирает с глупой улыбкой на губах и чуть склоненной набок головой. Вы ощущаете, как кожа покрывается мурашками, а воротник начинает едва заметно трепетать — словно на сквозняке, вылетевшем из приоткрытой двери.{/n}

You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “没问题，咱们来听听他们有什么关于你的悄悄话，嗯？”{n}伊迪拉笑了起来，搓了搓手，之后突然僵在了那里。她的脸上挂着空洞的微笑，头微微歪着。你感到皮肤上起了鸡皮疙瘩，衣领也开始微微颤动，仿佛某扇半开的门里吹来了微风。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没问题，咱们来听听他们有什么关于你的悄悄话，嗯？”{n}伊迪拉笑了起来，搓了搓手，之后突然僵在了那里。她的脸上挂着空洞的微笑，头微微歪着。你感到皮肤上起了鸡皮疙瘩，衣领也开始微微颤动，仿佛某扇半开的门里吹来了微风。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}

languages.text: «Muy bien, vamos a ver qué dicen de usted. Mmm...». {n}Idira se ríe, se frota las manos... y se queda inmóvil con una sonrisa ausente y la cabeza ligeramente ladeada. Sientes cómo se eriza tu pelo y tu ropa se agita muy levemente, como si la moviera la brisa de una puerta medio abierta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien, vamos a ver qué dicen de usted. Mmm...». {n}Idira se ríe, se frota las manos... y se queda inmóvil con una sonrisa ausente y la cabeza ligeramente ladeada. Sientes cómo se eriza tu pelo y tu ropa se agita muy levemente, como si la moviera la brisa de una puerta medio abierta.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「わかったわ、彼らがあなたについて何をささやいているのか聞いてみましょうか？」{n}イディラは笑い、両手をこすり合わせ、そして突然、虚ろな笑みを浮かべて固まり、わずかに首を傾げた。あなたは鳥肌が立つのを感じ、襟元が微かに揺れ始める。まるで半開きの扉からそよ風が吹き込んできたかのごとく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「わかったわ、彼らがあなたについて何をささやいているのか聞いてみましょうか？」{n}イディラは笑い、両手をこすり合わせ、そして突然、虚ろな笑みを浮かべて固まり、わずかに首を傾げた。あなたは鳥肌が立つのを感じ、襟元が微かに揺れ始める。まるで半開きの扉からそよ風が吹き込んできたかのごとく。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Also gut, dann hören wir mal, was sie über Euch flüstern, hmm?" {n}Idira lacht, reibt die Hände zusammen — und ist plötzlich wie versteinert, den Kopf leicht geneigt und mit einem leeren Lächeln auf den Lippen. Du spürst, wie du eine Gänsehaut bekommst, und dein Kragen beginnt leicht zu zittern, als würde die Zugluft aus einer halb geöffneten Tür ihn streifen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Also gut, dann hören wir mal, was sie über Euch flüstern, hmm?" {n}Idira lacht, reibt die Hände zusammen — und ist plötzlich wie versteinert, den Kopf leicht geneigt und mit einem leeren Lächeln auf den Lippen. Du spürst, wie du eine Gänsehaut bekommst, und dein Kragen beginnt leicht zu zittern, als würde die Zugluft aus einer halb geöffneten Tür ihn streifen.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « D'accord, écoutons donc ce qu'ils murmurent à votre sujet, » {n}répond Idira avec un petit rire en se frottant les mains. Soudain, elle se fige, la tête légèrement penchée, le sourire toujours au coin des lèvres. Très vite, vous commencez à avoir la chair de poule et votre col se met à remuer, comme sous l'effet d'un courant d'air s'engouffrant dans la pièce par une porte entrouverte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « D'accord, écoutons donc ce qu'ils murmurent à votre sujet, » {n}répond Idira avec un petit rire en se frottant les mains. Soudain, elle se fige, la tête légèrement penchée, le sourire toujours au coin des lèvres. Très vite, vous commencez à avoir la chair de poule et votre col se met à remuer, comme sous l'effet d'un courant d'air s'engouffrant dans la pièce par une porte entrouverte.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Pekâlâ, bakalım hakkında neler fısıldayacaklar." {n}İdira kahkaha atıyor, ellerini ovuşturuyor ve... Aniden yüzünde boş bir gülümsemeyle donakalıyor. Başını biraz yana yatırıyor. Tüylerinin diken diken olduğunu hissediyorsun. Yakan, sanki yarı açık bir kapıdan gelen esintiyle oynarmış gibi sallanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All right, let's hear what they're whispering about you, hmm?" {n}Idira laughs, rubs her hands together — and suddenly freezes with a vacant smile on her face, her head slightly tilted. You feel goosebumps appear on your skin, and your collar begins to waver ever so slightly, as if moved by a breeze from a half-open door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ, bakalım fısıltılar senin hakkında neler diyecekler." {n}İdira kahkaha atıyor, ellerini ovuşturuyor ve... Aniden yüzünde boş bir gülümsemeyle donakalıyor. Başını biraz yana yatırıyor. Tüylerinin diken diken olduğunu hissediyorsun. Yakanın etrafında çok hafif bir titreşim başlıyor. Sanki hafif aralık bir kapıdan gelen bir meltemle hareket etmiş gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
